arts.ttl: Fiorentina-Bologna, European points to play for
arts.sum: The Rossoblu have only once gone four consecutive matches without a win in Serie A this season: in the first four matchdays (D3 L1). Bologna are the opponent against whom Fiorentina have recorded the most victories in their Serie A history: 57 wins in 145 matches, along with 42 wins for the Emilians and 46 draws.
